from.edge_definition: Edge linking specific node Institution with a specific node Country

works_at.edge_definition: Edge linking specific node User with specific node Institution

created_by.edge_definition: Edge linking specific node Project with specific node User

edge_attributes.created_date: Date of creation of the Project, ex.:'2021-09-23T18:32:09.859637Z'

created_at.edge_definition: Edge linking specific node Project with specific node Institution

has_experiment.edge_definition: Edge linking specific node Project with specific node Experiment

has_run.edge_definition: Edge linking specific node Experiment with specific node Run

is_product.edge_definition: Edge linking specific product information from Experiment to a Compound node

is_substrate.edge_definition: Edge linking specific substrate information from Experiment to a Compound node

uses_fermenter.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Run node with a Fermenter node.

edge_attributes.reactor_id: Identifier of the bioreactor, the inidividual manufactured device or system that supports the bioprocess.

cultures_strain.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Run node with a specific Strain node.

is_parent_of.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Strain node to another Strain node who is a parent of the first one.

belongs_to.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Strain node with a specific node Species

has_medium.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Run node with a Medium node.

edge_attributes.medium_acid_adjustment: Medium ID implemented for pH acid adjustment
edge_attributes.medium_base_adjustment: Medium ID implemented for pH basic adjustment

derived_from.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific medium derived from or implemented in a media recipe for another medium.

has_ingredient.edge_definition: Edge linging a specific Medium node with a specific Ingredient node.

edge_attributes.amount_text: Compound amount wit text annotation, such as QS (Quantity Sufficient)

uses_ingredient.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific ingredient node with a specific calculated variable node.

has_measured_cultivation_cond.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Run node with a Cultivation Condition node.

edge_attributes.data: Data for each cultivation condition. Can be scalar(data type as a list of length 1) or categorical data.
edge_attributes.data_format: Data type. Scalar, categorical or time series.

has_measured_process_var.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Run node with a measured Process Variable node.

edge_attributes.data: Time series data for each process variable.
edge_attributes.data_format: Data type. Scalar, categorical or time series.

has_measured_compound.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Run node with a measured Compound node.

edge_attributes.data: Time series data for each process variable.
edge_attributes.data_format: Data type. Scalar, categorical or time series.

uses_compound.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Compound variable with a specific calculated variable node.

has_calculated_var.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Run node with a Calculated Variable node.

edge_attributes.data: Time series data for each process variable.
edge_attributes.data_format: Data type. Scalar, categorical or time series.

has_calculated_imodulon.edge_definition: Edge linking a specific Run node with a calculated iModulon node.

edge_attributes.data: Time series data for each process variable.
edge_attributes.data_format: Data type. Scalar, categorical or time series.
